testimonials.name: Anar Allahverdiyev
testimonials.info: “My expectation is to start this business and apply around the country.

testimonials.name: Laman Khudadatzada
testimonials.info: “My expectation is to turn WaterSavers project into “Smart-Life” project, and develop devices for more efficient use of electricity and gas.”

testimonials.name: Nuray Gurbanova
testimonials.info: “My expectation is to replace sensor inside of the WaterSavers with an integrated WiFi module in order to achieve the most modern version of our product”
